alert.note: Alert for Eastern Lincoln County; South Central Mountains; Southwest Chaves County; Southwest Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 14 at 3:53AM MST until January 15 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Eastern Lincoln County, South Central Mountains, Southwest Chaves County, and Southwest Mountains. * WHEN...From Sunday morning through Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A few inches of snow will also be possible above 7500 feet in Catron County, where blowing snow may drop the visibility to near zero at times.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Lincoln County; South Central Mountains; Southwest Chaves County; Southwest Mountains
